sqlMap.select:
SELECT BANK_LINE_ID ,BANK_LINE_NUMBER ,BANK_NAME ,ONLINE_BANK_NUMBER ,SETTLE_LINE_NUMBER ,STATUS ,INTERBANK_SETTLE_STATUS ,BANK_TYPE ,CREATE_TIME ,FINISH_TIME ,KEYWORD ,CODE ,WITH_HOLDING_CODE FROM BANK_BEHALF_BRANCH WHERE 1=1 AND BANK_BEHALF_BRANCH.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BANK_LINE_ID) =#bank_line_id#
(BANK_LINE_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#bank_line_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ONLINE_BANK_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#online_bank_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_LINE_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#settle_line_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(INTERBANK_SETTLE_STATUS) Like '%'||(#interbank_settle_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bank_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(KEYWORD) Like '%'||(#keyword:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CODE) Like '%'||(#code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(WITH_HOLDING_CODE) Like '%'||(#with_holding_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM BANK_BEHALF_BRANCH WHERE 1=1 AND BANK_BEHALF_BRANCH.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BANK_LINE_ID) =#bank_line_id#
(BANK_LINE_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#bank_line_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ONLINE_BANK_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#online_bank_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_LINE_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#settle_line_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(INTERBANK_SETTLE_STATUS) Like '%'||(#interbank_settle_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BANK_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bank_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(KEYWORD) Like '%'||(#keyword:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CODE) Like '%'||(#code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(WITH_HOLDING_CODE) Like '%'||(#with_holding_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
